value.description: A Covetheus weatherproof hoodie (sand coloured) to stop scrapes and bruises, and to keep one warm in chilly weather.
A Covetheus Casual Jumpsuit (grey coloured) for everyday wear for your colonist.

value.description: A soft, flat crowned hat which has been sharply formed to the right. Affixed to the beret, in-line with the left eye, is a unit identification patch.

value.description: Designed by MiningCo., this working apparel is specifically designed for mining operations. The vest is complete with an embedded personal light.
Designed by MiningCo., this helmet is a miners best friend. This hard hat will help protect you when the roof comes crashing down. Its light is also reassuring when alone in dark caves.

value.description: An ergonomically designed tactical vest with integrated armour. This type of armour increases the combatant's efficiency.
Advanced tactical helmet designed to protect the head during combat.

The "Judicator" riot gear was produced by Arms Dynamics for Federation human commanders. Though extremely capable of protecting the wearer during hostilities, it does nothing to block the scornful eyes of the people.

Arms Dynamics' "Condemner" marksman gear. With joint stabilizer units, this outfit is designed to improve the combatants aiming efficiency. Standard issue gear of the Federation Peacebringer Assassin Corps.
Standard issue body armor for all frontline members of the Federation Unity Guard.
A standard issue helmet for all frontline members of the Federation Unity Guard
A cloak worn by members of the Federation Unity Guard. It is typically worn for ceremonial purposes, or to inspire... or terrorize... the people.
